subject: Productivity
title: Yoga and Stress Regulation
description: A quick, practical guide to Yoga and Stress Regulation.

hook.text: Yoga practitioners show thicker prefrontal cortexes on brain scans. The practice literally grows the brain.

buildup.text: Yoga combines movement, breath control, and mindfulness. All three independently reduce stress hormones.

discovery.text: Harvard research found that eight weeks of yoga reduced cortisol levels and improved emotional regulation.

twist.text: The benefit isn't flexibility. It's nervous system regulation. Yoga trains the body to shift from stress to calm.

climax.text: For knowledge workers, yoga's stress-reduction benefit matters more than any physical flexibility gains.

punchline.text: Yoga doesn't just stretch muscles. It stretches your stress tolerance.

quiz.question: What is the primary productivity benefit of yoga for knowledge workers?
options: Stress reduction and nervous system regulation
